summary: Comprehensive testing of Speed Alert overlay app for Google Maps completed successfully. All core features working correctly including Google Maps integration, speedometer, settings panel, demo mode, and alert system.

design_issues.issue: Using deprecated google.maps.Marker instead of AdvancedMarkerElement
design_issues.impact: Console warning only - functionality not affected

passed_tests: Speed limit API with valid coordinates
Speed limit API error handling (invalid/missing params)
Speed limit API remote location handling
Google Maps loads with dark theme
Speed limit sign shows 'NO DATA' without GPS
Settings panel opens via gear icon
Center location button exists and works
Demo Mode speed fluctuation (29-54 mph range)
Speed alert overlay triggers when over limit
